thread.section_title: Pullman Paris Tour Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Paris Paradise
thread.title_full: Paris Paradise - Review of Pullman Paris Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Lani D
title: Paris Paradise
text:
The Pullman Eiffel Tower is more than amazing. To sit and watch from your balcony the Eiffel Tower twinkling every hour is an experience I can't wait to relive. Who knew the tower even twinkled !!
The hotel is in the best location ever !! A short stroll to your Segway office to go on the best tour of Paris. Everyone at every age should try a Segway. The hotel staff will happily print your vouchers for activities and help you make the best decisions for dinner. The breakfast served is everything you can imagine in a breakfast. Excellent!! I give the hotel the highest rating possible.
